summary:
Adds a new EPIC bow to the game.
Currently has the Hunting Bow texture....
descriptionHtml:
-----------------------------Stats------------------------------------
Damage: 20
Weight: 2
Value: 3000
Enchantment: None
Type: Bow
Speed: 1.8500 (Almost twice as fast as the original speed for Boes)
Crafting Recipe: Blacksmith Forge under the STEEL category and no need for any perk
2 Leather Strips
3 Firewood
Tempering Recipe: 
1 Firewood
1 Leather Strip
-----------------------------------Installation--------------------------------------
1) Extract \"TheQuickdraw.esp\" to your Data folder in your Skyrim directory
2) Open your \"SkyrimLauncher.exe\" and click \"Data Files\" and check if \"TheQuickdraw.esp\" is ticked
3) \"Data Files\" is grayed out? Add this line on the TOP of your \"SkyrimPrefs.ini\" which is located at Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim.

[Launcher]
bEnableFileSelection = 1
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Video: (Coming Soon)
Other Mods: Infernus - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9739
Credits: Bethesda for making Skyrim,Creation Kit,and the Hunting Bow Texture

REMEMBER IF YOU LIKE IT ENDORSE IT
author: CarlosCH1221
